General.Name: Zhejiang Zhongjian Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Zhongjian Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of various garden machinery products in China and internationally. It offers chainsaws, brush cutters, hedge trimmers, riding lawn mowers, sweepers, and hand pushers. Zhejiang Zhongjian Technology Co.,Ltd was formerly known as Yongkang Zhongjian Tools Manufacture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Zhongjian Technology Co.,Ltd in December 2010. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yongkang, China.
General.Address: No. 10, Mingyuan South Avenue, Yongkang, China, 321300

1.Name: Ms. Zhaoyue  Lu
